body: Just ask me anything in this thread :D!

title: WQMBAT/Junr -AMA

replies.body: What was your reaction when you got  junior moderator?

replies.body: I was actually really suprised and I told my brother and he was like: What really. I actually never thought I would become Junior Moderator and kept telling myself that I wouldn't get it, but here I am with Jr Mod. It was also cool that the Robert's got promoted today.

replies.body:
How does it feel to be Junior Mod? Pressured? Fun?
Who else do you think is capable of getting the rank?
Describe where you live, and would you recommend someone to visit the place?
Why the IGN Junr? Also origins of any other IGNs if you have any other, too lazy to check right now.
Where do you plan to bring Emoji to? Just a relaxing one or a competitive one?
How did you find Avicus? What made you stay to play? Opinions on the server?
If you could travel back in time, what would you have changed?
Opinions on me? I don't think you know me very well though
replies.body_tagged:
How does it feel to be Junior Mod? Pressured? Fun?

Describe where you live, and would you recommend someone to visit the place?
Why the IGN Junr? Also origins of any other IGNs if you have any other, too lazy to check right now.
Where do you plan to bring Emoji to? Just a relaxing one or a competitive one?
How did you find Avicus? What made you stay to play? Opinions on the server?
If you could travel back in time, what would you have changed?
Opinions on me? I don't think you know me very well though

replies.body:
1. It feels cool to be Jr Mod, but I am kinda afraid that I won't succeed the trial, but I will try my best at it.
2. I honestly think Acceqted will be getting Jr Mod, he's a cool dude to be around and I hope to see him Jr Mod one day :D.
3. I live a mile away from the beach and I would recommend people to visit. It's not too hot during the summer, but it is cold during the winter. I'm also located in a place where Finding Dory Started her journey (not a spoiler, I read it on an article) 
4. I got the idea Junr from my brother when I was looking for a new name. My parents would always call me Junr when they were too lazy to say Junior, so yeah. I have 13 name changes, so I'm not going to explain all, but I can explain it to you in TS.
5. I just want to be happy and have happy team members :D
6. Before I bought MC, my friend told me to join these servers when I got it, so I did and I loved it ever since, but when they changed it to Avic.us, I lost it until I contacted support.
7. I think you are a chill dude and I hope to get to know/talk to you a lot.
replies.body_tagged:
1. It feels cool to be Jr Mod, but I am kinda afraid that I won't succeed the trial, but I will try my best at it.
2. I honestly think Acceqted will be getting Jr Mod, he's a cool dude to be around and I hope to see him Jr Mod one day :D.
3. I live a mile away from the beach and I would recommend people to visit. It's not too hot during the summer, but it is cold during the winter. I'm also located in a place where Finding Dory Started her journey (not a spoiler, I read it on an article) 
4. I got the idea Junr from my brother when I was looking for a new name. My parents would always call me Junr when they were too lazy to say Junior, so yeah. I have 13 name changes, so I'm not going to explain all, but I can explain it to you in TS.
5. I just want to be happy and have happy team members :D
6. Before I bought MC, my friend told me to join these servers when I got it, so I did and I loved it ever since, but when they changed it to Avic.us, I lost it until I contacted support.
7. I think you are a chill dude and I hope to get to know/talk to you a lot.

replies.body:
Hey Junr! What's up? I've never actually spoken to you a lot, but I've always seen you in game and you're a nice, chill player; even if you do destroy me sometimes. :P Anyway... questions!

  1. Is there something that happened to you that had no explanation?
  2. What is the longest you have gone without sleep?
  3. Have you ever been stung by a bee?
  4. What cheers you up?
  5. How do you start a conversation?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. What was your impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Congratulations again on your trial and good luck. Have a good one! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

Oh Cammy, where do I begin, you're an awesome person to talk to and an amazing friend. I hope one day, when it is needed, you will be a Senior Moderator. I am happy that I can be Staff with you :D. 

Austrailia seems like a really cool place and I hope to visit there one day. I actually have some friends that are from Australia and also, Sia is from there too :D.

Your internet is good tbh. You don't have as bad ping like me lol.

replies.body:
Hey Junr!
Before I start questioning you..I wanted to congratulate and thank you.
Congratulations on being a Junior Moderator (it really fits with your name)
Although I have just began to know you, you really deserve the position.
Keep loving, contributing, and sharing to Avicus, because you are a REALLY awesome person.
Be optimistic as you have always been (I hope so..) xD

And thank you so much for inviting me to Emoji Team.
You are a very awesome, chill, kind, and empathetic person.
I am so thankful. xD

Now with the questions:

1. What is the longest you have gone without eating?
2. Do you have a girlfriend?
3. What would be an ideal birthday gift for you?
4. What is your dream job?
5. Do you think that you will be a famous YouTuber?
6. Should I make more intros for you? If so, what song would you like me to put?
7. What's your favorite book?
8. What's your favorite color?
9. How many places in the world have you been?
10. How do you look like? (I am dying to know how you look like. You got handsome voice xD)

And that's enough for the questions.
I have 20 more...but I think this will do for now ;)
Congratulations and thanks!
Hooray for Junr!
Bye!
See you in game! xD

And that's enough for the questions.
I have 20 more...but I think this will do for now ;)
Congratulations and thanks!
Hooray for Junr!
Bye!
See you in game! xD

replies.body:
1. Chocolate
2.  100
3. Venomous and Clay Wars
4. I would release Atlas and make more clearer rules so I can knock more sense into players that really need it.
5. I would forgive everyone and give everyone a second chance, so that everyone can be on the same page.
6. I'm going to be honest, at first I thought you were annoying, however, once I started talking to you, I was wrong. When I found out you failed your Jr Map Dev trial, I was REALLY bummed out since I thought you would of passed your trial. You are a really good and funny friend, and I always enjoy those little skype conversations we have :3. Sometimes I do like it when you ignore me, so I can spam you >:D hehe.
replies.body_tagged:
1. Chocolate
2.  100
